channel.title: My 1st sig..plz rate
channel.description: this is my 1st sig.....i dont kno if i'm good yet or not so plz rate this for me: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/6028/cabel2ou0.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: My 1st sig..plz rate
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:16, topic:151353”]Imageshack > Photobucket
Photobucket has a space limit.[/quote]
It does?
oh, lol.

If Photobucket had no space limit, it would be better.

item.title: My 1st sig..plz rate
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:14, topic:151353”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=207012.msg1822789#msg1822789 date=1192410632]
Don’t use IMAGESHACK. use photobucket.
here comes the critique:
And… now, I realized, it looks a bit ripped.
It need some more colors, but still blended.
It looks like a plain stock background on the back. Smudge it a bit, and add some light-points.
But it’s nice…

[/quote]

Image shack is better, and I asked for a .psd because its impossible to be his first.
Could be first uploaded :P[/quote]
Naw, photobucket is better.
Because imageshack, you just upload it and WHOOPEE!!! It is permanently there, with anybody be able to take it by browsing >_<
Photobucket has an account. Of course they can rip and upload it, but it makes more sense to use an account.

And yes, it could have been first uploaded.

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st sig..plz rate
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

killerman93:

No way thats your first, post a PSD, thats like, impossible.

My first was better, and how is that impossible?

[quote=“br0k3n_pk, post:6, topic:151353”][quote author=i–own–i link=topic=207012.msg1819985#msg1819985 date=1192292725]
Your first and you made it all… ? If its not a lie then thats pretty good.

What program do you use.
[/quote]
i use the GIMP and why do i need to post a psd also this is my very 1st graphic…i’ve been looking at tuts for 3 months[/quote]
GIMP, heh.
Personally, I like PS better. What he means by PSD is, its a data file for PS
If you open it with PS, it will show the image and the steps you did to create it. If you just opened a regular file like JPEG, GIF, PNG, it will just show the image.

And, lose the border. It is better of 1px black.

and, nice choice! PNG.

Awesome dude, that is some truly nice work, especially on GIMP.

Read full topic
